verses.verse: Amaziah<WH558> was twenty<WH6242> - five<WH2568> years<WH8141> old<WH1121> when he began to reign;<WH4427> and he reigned<WH4427> twenty<WH6242> - nine<WH8672> years<WH8141> in Jerusalem:<WH3389> and his mother<WH517>'s name<WH8034> was Jehoaddan,<WH3086> of Jerusalem.<WH3389>
